description: Did you know, You can sell items with `sell <item> <amount>`
If you need help with commands, you can use the `help` command.
Did you know, server owners can make server sided shops?
Penguins wear tuxedos so they always look fancy underwater.
Did you know, you can view your rank in this server with `!rank`?
Did you know, You can use M's and K's instead of 0's.
Did you know, The bot counts how many commands you send.
Did you know, You can use `botinfo` to read info about the bot.
Did you know, the `serverinfo` command shows all possible info about the server.
Did you know, The owner knows nothing about coding and uses chatGPT.
Did you know, The bot has a test- and bug report [server](<https://discord.gg/c26ZCC3TKu>).
Did you know, There are 21 tips.
Did you know, You can quick buy with `buy <item>`.
Did you know, You can view server shop with `sshop`.
Did you know, Your pillowcase has more germs than a toilet seat. Guess whoâ€™s not keeping secrets!
Did you know, The bot has a few commands that can only be run by the owner in [this server](<https://discord.gg/Yn88yTnpub>).
The bot is still in major development. Thank you for using this!
Did you know, There are a few easter eggs in this bot.
Did you know, There are multiple shortcuts for commands. Like `inventory` has `inv`.
Did you know, This bot also offers moderation commands. Use the `help` command to view all commands.
Did you know.
